header: Israel Will Return to the Lord

verse: A message from the Lord came to Jeremiah. The Lord said,
“I am the Lord. I am the God of Israel. I say, ‘Write in a book all the words I have spoken to you.

A new day is coming,’ ” announces the Lord. “ ‘At that time I will bring my people Israel and Judah back from where they have been taken as prisoners. I will bring them back to this land. I gave it to their people of long ago to have as their own,’ ” says the Lord.
Here are the words the Lord spoke about Israel and Judah. He said,
